Package com.techhounds.houndutil.houndlog

Class LogGroup

java.lang.Object
com.techhounds.houndutil.houndlog.LogGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
Loggable
public class LogGroup extends Object implements Loggable
Defines a group of Loggers to log. This is useful when used in a subsystem where you only want to call one logger.run() method.
